Class TaskProcessorEventDriven<K>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.concurrent.TaskProcessorBase
com.dua3.utility.concurrent.TaskProcessorEventDriven<K>
Type Parameters:
K - the type of the unique key associated with each task
All Implemented Interfaces:
TaskProcessor
public class TaskProcessorEventDriven<K> extends TaskProcessorBase
An event-driven implementation of a task processor, built on top of TaskProcessorBase. This processor manages tasks submitted to an external system and processes task updates received asynchronously.

  • Nested Class Summary

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the task processor
      submitExternal - a function that takes a Callable task and returns a unique key of type K associated with the submitted task

  • Method Details

    • updateTask

      public void updateTask(K key, Object result, boolean isCompleted)
      Updates the task associated with the given key by either completing the task or logging an update if the task is not marked as completed. If the task is completed, it sets the result and removes the future from the internal task map. If the task is not found or not completed, it logs appropriate messages.

      Call this method to inform the task processor about processing events received from the external system.

      Parameters:
      key - the unique identifier for the task being updated
      result - the result to be set if the task is successfully completed
      isCompleted - a flag indicating whether the task is completed

    • addTaskTimeout

      public void addTaskTimeout(K key, Duration timeout)
      Sets a timeout for a task associated with the specified key. If the task is not found or already completed, the timeout is ignored. If the task is found and not yet completed, a timeout is applied to the task using the specified duration.
      Parameters:
      key - the unique identifier for the task
      timeout - the duration after which the task will time out

    • submit

      public <T> CompletableFuture<T> submit(Callable<? extends T> task)
      Description copied from interface: TaskProcessor
      Submit a task that that returns a result.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the task result type
      Parameters:
      task - the task to execute
      Returns:
      a CompletableFuture for the task
